title: Should She Tell Her Cheating Brother That His Girlfriend Is Coming To Visit?
description:
Chelsea, A Bert Show listener, is stuck between a rock and a hard place. Her brother is a freshman in college and this weekend her mom wants to surprise him and pay him a visit. Their mom also wants to bring his girlfriend, but there’s a major flaw in this plan that only Chelsea is aware of; Her brother is seeing someone else.
